Comment: They were selling, not losing. And what difference does a temporary setback make to a billionaire? They have more money than they can ever spend in their lifetimes anyway, unlike most of us, and enough power to buy countries and their politicians. There are multiple billionaires running the U.S. right now.  Articles like this are supposed to make you think there is progress or some kind of retribution for the concentration of wealth, so that you can feel good. Nothing could be further from the truth. Wealth and power is concentrating, not being dispersed back to the people. Don't fool yourself.
